text: Gerhard Vilhelm Jynge (1877 – February 21, 1945) was a Norwegian newspaper editor. He became the editor of Oplandenes Avis in 1908Høeg, Tom Arbo. 1974. Norske aviser: Registerbind. Oslo: Universitetsbibliotekets Hustrykkeri, p. 179. and the sub-editor of Verdens Gang in 1911, served as the first editor of Haugesunds Dagblad from June 8, 1912 to December 1913, became the editor of Dagsposten in Trondheim in 1914, and was the editor of Aalesunds Avis from 1917 to 1921.Diesen, Emil. 1921. Norske aviser og tidsskrifter med fortegnelse over norske pressefolk 1920. Kristiania, p. 19. He became an appellate judge pro tem in Bergen in 1921, and a regular judge in 1928. He died on February 21, 1945, when the steamship Austri was sunk by British aircraft in Bømla Fjord.DigitaltMuseum: Det gamle skatollet.Olderkjær, Ove A. 2015. Kystruta skoten i senk av sine eigne. Bergens Tidende (February 20). ==References== Category:1877 births Category:1945 deaths Category:Norwegian newspaper editors Category:Norwegian judges Category:Deaths due to shipwreck Category:Norwegian civilians killed in World War II
title: Gerhard Jynge
